mapper.select: select r.roomNum AS roomNum, -- 룸넘버 rs.roomStatusNum AS roomStatusNum, -- 방 상태 넘버 rt.roomTypeName AS roomTypeName, -- 룸 유형 r.roomThumbNail AS roomThumbNail, -- 룸 대표이미지 r.roomTitle AS roomTitle, -- 룸 제목 r.roomStartDate AS roomStartDate, -- 시작날짜 p.periodNum AS periodType, -- 기간 r.roomMinNum AS roomMinNum, -- 최소인원 r.roomMaxNum AS roomMaxNum, -- 최대인원 r.roomEnterPoint AS roomPoint, -- 입장포인트 r.roomEnterRate AS roomRate, -- 입장성실도 c.categoryName AS categoryName, -- 카테고리 r.roomKEyword AS roomKeyword, -- 키워드 re.regionName AS regionName -- 지역 from roomInfo r join roomStatus rs on rs.roomStatusNum = r.roomStatusNum join roomType rt on r.roomTypeNum = rt.roomTypeNum join period p on p.periodNum = r.periodNum join categories c on c.categoryNum = r.categoryNum join regions re on re.regionNum = r.regionNum where rs.roomStatusNum = 2;

select r.roomNum AS roomNum, -- 룸넘버 rs.roomStatusNum AS roomStatusNum, -- 방 상태 넘버 rt.roomTypeName AS roomTypeName, -- 룸 유형 r.roomThumbNail AS roomThumbNail, -- 룸 대표이미지 r.roomTitle AS roomTitle, -- 룸 제목 r.roomStartDate AS roomStartDate, -- 시작날짜 p.periodNum AS periodType, -- 기간 r.roomMinNum AS roomMinNum, -- 최소인원 r.roomMaxNum AS roomMaxNum, -- 최대인원 r.roomEnterPoint AS roomPoint, -- 입장포인트 r.roomEnterRate AS roomRate, -- 입장성실도 c.categoryName AS categoryName, -- 카테고리 r.roomKEyword AS roomKeyword, -- 키워드 re.regionName AS regionName -- 지역 from roomInfo r join roomStatus rs on rs.roomStatusNum = r.roomStatusNum join roomType rt on r.roomTypeNum = rt.roomTypeNum join period p on p.periodNum = r.periodNum join categories c on c.categoryNum = r.categoryNum join regions re on re.regionNum = r.regionNum where rs.roomStatusNum = 2 and c.categoryName = #{category}

SELECT r.roomNum AS roomNum, -- 룸 넘버 rs.roomStatusNum AS roomStatusNum, -- 방 상태 넘버 rt.roomTypeName AS roomTypeName, -- 룸 유형 r.roomThumbNail AS roomThumbNail, -- 룸 대표 이미지 r.roomTitle AS roomTitle, -- 룸 제목 r.roomStartDate AS roomStartDate, -- 시작 날짜 p.periodNum AS periodType, -- 기간 r.roomMinNum AS roomMinNum, -- 최소 인원 r.roomMaxNum AS roomMaxNum, -- 최대 인원 r.roomEnterPoint AS roomPoint, -- 입장 포인트 r.roomEnterRate AS roomRate, -- 입장 성실도 c.categoryName AS categoryName, -- 카테고리 r.roomKeyword AS roomKeyword, -- 키워드 re.regionName AS regionName -- 지역 FROM roomInfo r JOIN roomStatus rs ON rs.roomStatusNum = r.roomStatusNum JOIN roomType rt ON r.roomTypeNum = rt.roomTypeNum JOIN period p ON p.periodNum = r.periodNum JOIN categories c ON c.categoryNum = r.categoryNum JOIN regions re ON re.regionNum = r.regionNum WHERE rs.roomStatusNum = 2 AND ( r.roomTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') -- 방 제목 검색 OR p.periodNum LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') -- 기간 검색 OR r.roomKeyword LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') -- 키워드 검색 OR c.categoryName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') -- 카테고리 검색 OR re.regionName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') -- 지역 검색 );
select periodNum AS periodType from period
